# Canonical Product Names

> Dictionary of official product name forms. Used by the polishing skill to normalize
> capitalization and naming after Phase 4 assembly.
> Compiled from Pattern #4 in polishing-intelligence.md (23% of newsletters affected).

## GitHub Copilot Products

| Incorrect Form | Canonical Form |
|----------------|---------------|
| `coding agent` | `Coding Agent` |
| `copilot coding agent` | `Copilot Coding Agent` |
| `agent mode` | `Agent Mode` |
| `plan agent` / `plan mode` | `Plan Agent` / `Plan Mode` |
| `copilot spaces` | `Copilot Spaces` |
| `copilot chat` | `Copilot Chat` |
| `copilot extensions` | `Copilot Extensions` |
| `next edit suggestions` | `Next Edit Suggestions (NES)` |
| `custom agents` | `Custom Agents` |
| `isolated subagents` | `Isolated Subagents` |
| `agent hq` | `Agent HQ` |
| `mission control` | `Mission Control` |
| `copilot cli` | `Copilot CLI` |
| `copilot memory` / `agentic memory` | `Copilot Memory` / `Agentic Memory` |
| `mcp server` | `MCP Server` |
| `code quality` | `Code Quality` |
| `copilot code review` | `Copilot Code Review` |

## GitHub Platform Products

| Incorrect Form | Canonical Form |
|----------------|---------------|
| `issues` (product) | `Issues` |
| `pull requests` (product) | `Pull Requests` |
| `github actions` | `GitHub Actions` |
| `github projects` | `GitHub Projects` |
| `codespaces` | `Codespaces` |
| `dependabot` | `Dependabot` |
| `codeql` | `CodeQL` |
| `secret scanning` | `Secret Scanning` |
| `code scanning` | `Code Scanning` |

## IDE Names

| Incorrect Form | Canonical Form |
|----------------|---------------|
| `vs code` / `vscode` | `VS Code` |
| `visual studio` | `Visual Studio` |
| `jetbrains` | `JetBrains` |
| `xcode` | `Xcode` |
| `eclipse` | `Eclipse` |

## Status Labels

| Incorrect Form | Canonical Form |
|----------------|---------------|
| `(GA)` | `` (`GA`) `` |
| `(PREVIEW)` | `` (`PREVIEW`) `` |
| `(Preview)` | `` (`PREVIEW`) `` |
| `(**GA**)` | `` (`GA`) `` |
| `(**PREVIEW**)` | `` (`PREVIEW`) `` |
| `` **`GA`** `` | `` (`GA`) `` |
| `` **`PREVIEW`** `` | `` (`PREVIEW`) `` |

## Notes

- Only capitalize product names when referring to the product itself, not generic uses
  - "We filed several issues" (lowercase, generic)
  - "Navigate to GitHub Issues" (capitalized, product)
- When in doubt, check the official GitHub Changelog for the canonical form
